name: Blackmagic
body:
### Welcome to BlackMagic

This is a simple Music Player with added functionality, built purely using React Redux on Node.js.
It allows users to
* Play songs from your device
* Host songs on your local network
* Become a DJ
* Mini radio station
* Synchronize the same song to multiple users

### React

This application relies heavily on React as a view library and Redux as a view framework.
Server is build on express and socket.io is used for webSockets
 
### Creating pages manually

This is an open-source project, feel free to customize the UI or add more features on the existing platform
 ### Authors and Contributors

Made by Tharun (@tharunsikhinam). 2016 -> no copyrights :P
 
### Support or Contact
 
Feel free to reach out at tharun.sikhinam@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
